com.weemo.sdk

Class Weemo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.weemo.sdk.Weemo

  • public final class Weemo
extends Object
    Weemo SDK interface. Any call to the Weemo SDK starts from this class.

    Weemo SDK for Android is an event-driven SDK, see WeemoEventBus to understand how weemo events work.
    Note that you should register your listener class before initializing the Weemo singleton.

    The WeemoEngine singleton is initialized in the host application by using the initialize(String, Context) static method.
    Upon connection, a ConnectedEvent is fired.

    The singleton instance can be retreived at anytime after initialization with instance().
    If the initialization isn't complete or successful when instance() is called, null is returned.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(String appId,
              Context context)
        Creates a WeemoEngine singleton Object. The initialization is asynchronous, a ConnectedEvent will be fired upon connection.
        Parameters:
        appId - The Weemo APPlication IDentifier.
        context - The Context to use.
        Throws:
        WeemoIllegalArgumentException - if appId or context is null
        WeemoPermissionRequiredException - if required Manifest.permissions are not requested in the AndroidManifest.xml file

      • instance

        public static WeemoEngine instance()
        Returns:
        The WeemoEngine singleton or null if the SDK was not initialized properly.

      • eventBus

        public static WeemoEventBus eventBus()
        Returns:
        The event bus for this application.

      • setLogLevel

        public static void setLogLevel(int logLevel)
        Sets the current log level of the SDK.
        Parameters:
        logLevel - The new log level to set.

      • disconnect

        @Deprecated
public static void disconnect()
        Deprecated. Replaced by WeemoEngine.disconnect()

      • getEngineStatus

        public static WeemoEngine.Status getEngineStatus()
        Returns:
        the current status of the WeemoEngine.

      • ensureNativeLoad

        public static void ensureNativeLoad()
        Ensure that the native library is loaded.

      • getVersionSDK

        public static String getVersionSDK()
        Returns:
        the version of the Weemo SDK.

      • getVersionFull

        public static String getVersionFull(Context context)
        Parameters:
        context - The Context to use.
        Returns:
        the full version name (SDK version + internal version + application version).
        Throws:
        WeemoIllegalArgumentException - if context is null
